comments:
GLA's Controller throws security exceptions upon startup.

Importing an Apache access log causes the following security exceptions to be 
thrown:

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.parsers.PreparationException: Error building 
component AdapterSensor. 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.internal.util.AdapterSensor is not 
accessible due to security restrictions.
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.ComponentFactory.buildComponent
(ComponentFactory.java:36)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.Controller.createContextsAndComponents
(Controller.java:337)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.Controller.prepareAdapter
(Controller.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.Adapter.start(Adapter.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config.StaticParserWrapper.parse
(StaticParserWrapper.java:86)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.LocalLogParserLoader.startParsing
(LocalLogParserLoader.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.run
(ImportLogWizard.java:356)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:101)
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.parsers.PreparationException: Error building 
component AdapterSensor. 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.internal.util.AdapterSensor is not 
accessible due to security restrictions.
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.Controller.createContextsAndComponents
(Controller.java:350)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.Controller.prepareAdapter
(Controller.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.Adapter.start(Adapter.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config.StaticParserWrapper.parse
(StaticParserWrapper.java:86)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.LocalLogParserLoader.startParsing
(LocalLogParserLoader.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.run
(ImportLogWizard.java:356)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:101)
Code checked-in on April 12/04 in HEAD.
